Summary: Fast moving light just above horizon
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Lakewood
There were no other sightings in Lakewood on or around March 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsOn a partly cloudy night, star-sized orange-red light 2 inches above horizon traveled extremely fast in a straight path from the south to the north. No sound accompanied the light during the four seconds it was visible. After the light was gone, an obvious airline jet was seen traveling from west to east at cruising altitude. No similarities between the two types of lights.
